reviews.text: A group stayed at the hotel while participating in a food show at Aviano Air Base in the area. While it shows four stars on its signage, it is much more a local old style hotel. Rooms are fully adequate and clean, bathrooms have all the needed amenities, including lots of hot water. Breakfast is very limited and space in the breakfast room does not encourage lingering over your cappacino. Staff is helpful, but instructions on how to operate the TV are inaccurate and it's just better to go down to the desk than attempt to call on the phone since there are no instructions on how to do that (no, you DON'T just dial "O"). Price is fair and service is good.
reviews.title: Small rural hotel

reviews.text: On football business. Stylish, friendly, spacious, laid-back hotel with great rooms. Staff helpful and obliging.Pools looked nice but closed in winter months , even though temp 22 degrees. Quiet town with pleasant big park nearby. Restaurant in hotel recently taken over. Brilliant food and chef very obliging and friendly waiting staff.Home made pasta and seafood as speciality.
reviews.title: Italian Style

reviews.text: This was a conference we attend hotel, the staff was great and bartender was perfect.
reviews.title: Nice Hotel and Great Staff

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: A few restaurants in but they are not always open. Two great place to sit and drink some good wine in town. Free Internet service but No food except for breakfast at the hotel.
reviews.title: Rooms & breakfast were OK but don't stay for the dinner.
